tours.name: Historical Paris
tours.description: Discover the rich history of Paris with this guided tour. Visit iconic landmarks and explore historical sites.

sites.name: Eiffel Tower
sites.localisation: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris
sites.description: The iconic landmark of Paris, offering breathtaking views of the city from its observation decks.

sites.name: Louvre Museum
sites.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument. Home to thousands of artworks including the famous Mona Lisa.

sites.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
sites.localisation: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, 75004 Paris
sites.description: A masterpiece of Gothic architecture, known for its stunning stained glass windows and intricate details.

sites.name: Palace of Versailles
sites.description: A grand royal palace known for its opulent interiors, stunning gardens, and historical significance.

sites.name: The Hall of Mirrors
sites.description: A magnificent hall lined with mirrors, showcasing the artistic and architectural prowess of the time.

tours.name: Artistic Paris
tours.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant art scene of Paris. Visit world-renowned museums and explore artistic neighborhoods.

sites.name: Louvre Museum
sites.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument. Home to thousands of artworks including the famous Mona Lisa.

sites.name: Musée d'Orsay
sites.localisation: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris
sites.description: An art museum housed in a former railway station, featuring a vast collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masterpieces.

sites.name: Montmartre
sites.description: A bohemian neighborhood known for its artistic legacy, charming streets, and the iconic Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

sites.name: Centre Pompidou
sites.description: A renowned contemporary art museum known for its unique architectural design and extensive modern art collection.

sites.name: Le Marais
sites.description: A historic district with a blend of medieval and contemporary charm. Explore its narrow streets, trendy boutiques, and historic landmarks.
